attributes.action: Force the banks to pass on more of the interest rate cuts....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BOE base rate is 0.5%, the majority of SVR's are circa 6%, which is completely unfair. The Government should force the banks to pass on a fairer cut!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
